pagecheckout-desc: Allows exclusive rights on a page for a user
page-checkout-error-no-checkout: Cannot check-in page that is not currently checked-out
page-checkout-error-no-checkout-id: Check-in failure! No checkout ID set
page-checkout-error-db-retrieve-inserted: Failed to retrieve previously inserted checkout
page-checkout-lockdown-reason: Action "$1" is not allowed, because page is checked out by $2
apihelp-pagecheckout-clear-param-page_ti: Title of the page for which to clear checkouts
page-checkout-ui-clear-confirm: Confirm clearing active checkout on this page? This will make page editable for all normally eligible users
log-description-page-checkout: Tracks the state of page checkouts and checkins
logentry-page-checkout-checkin: $1 {{GENDER:$2|checked in}} page $3 that was checked out for user $4
pagecheckout-alertbanner-checkout: This page is currently {{GENDER:$1|checked out}} for $2
